name: Hi, I'm zml.
body:
# What I do #
- [Spout](http://spout.org)
- A variety of Bukkit and Spout plugins. Most of the ones I have written myself are not present on dev.bukkit.org. However, I will answer any questions and probably keep them updated.
  - WorldEdit
  - NarwhalIRC
  - LiftPlates
- Food eating
- My dotfiles repository
  - My [awesome](http://awesome.naquadah.org) configuration scripts
  - My collection of vim plugins and vim configuration
  - Random potentially useful tidbits
- Other unreleased projects

I tend to rarely update my sites, so this list may be out of date. My [github profile](http://github.com/zml2008) usually provides a good idea of what I'm working on at the moment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
